title: 517 Container Security Defense
description: Learn how to secure your Docker Containers

courses.title: 517.1 Introduction to Docker Container Defense
courses.description: Learn the basis of defending Docker Containers with hands-on explanations

courses.title: 517.2 Protect the Docker Runtime
courses.description: Learn the 10 Do's and Don'ts on how to protect the  Docker Runtime with hands-on explanations

courses.title: 517.3 Buiding Secure Container Images
courses.description: Create and build Container Images in a secure fashion
